product_name: The North Face Afton Insulated Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Hit the slopes and never look back with the North Face Afton insulated jacket. Abundant sport-specific features offer everything you need to stay comfortable while carving up mountainsides. HyVent(R) Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Heatseeker(TM) synthetic insulation guards against cold while staying lightweight, breathable and durable. Fully adjustable, detachable hood easily accommodates helmets; jacket zips up to protect chin and lower face in blustery weather. Powder skirt, drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs keep out the spindrift and help seal in warmth. Internal goggle pocket and wrist accessory pocket with goggle cloth help keep all your gear in order. The North Face Afton insulated jacket features 2 zippered handwarmer pockets; 1 zippered internal security pocket with headphone guide keeps your tunes safely stowed. Closeout.
